ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of SONY PERRON of Gatineau, Quebec, to be Associate Deputy Minister of the Department of Indigenous Services Canada, styled as Associate Deputy Minister of Indigenous Services, to hold office during pleasure, effective December 17, 2017.
